r= 833017040604720436480457566234436524030438350784745487913


s= 37663062180790601572038241881673992939385661988899827957


e= 


the length of e is  999


x= 580196246640987146929897895201614522696734260626975106945


b0= -


e*r-x*phi-s= 0




alpha= 0.9995
delta= 0.1892
beta= 0.4984
gamma= 0.1848


To check that 2-0.5*gamma-4*beta<delta<1-0.5*gamma-sqrt(alpha*(2*beta-0.5)), the answer must be true


True


2-0.5*gamma-4*beta= -0.08580


delta= 0.1892


1-0.5*gamma-sqrt(alpha*(2*beta-0.5))= 0.2030


To check that 2*beta-0.5<alpha<8*beta-2 the answer must be true


True


2*beta-0.5= 0.4967


alpha= 0.9995


8*beta-2= 1.987


To check that |s|<inf(|er|,|xu|), the answer must be true


True


|s|= 37663062180790601572038241881673992939385661988899827957


inf(|er|,|xu|)= 37658338192377788427500118004416573056474184453513942381173174019769300220134099815570190187658843249835314921372508946289315484927979157676478694600952424419327750838883780773612702581481237858725512990440


T at the root (z1,z2,z3) modulo e must be zero


Mod(T(z1,z2,z3),e)= 0


theta at the root (z1,z4) modulo e must be zero


Mod(theta(z1,z4),e)= 0

To check that the private exponent d is of magnitude N


d= 


d=N^(delta0) with delta0= 0.9998
